config.script:
Currentyear = system.date.getYear(system.date.now())+0
	Currentmonth = system.date.getMonth(system.date.now())+1
	if Currentmonth-3<1:
		Startmonth = Currentmonth-3+12
		Startyear = Currentyear-1
	else:
		Startmonth = Currentmonth-3
		Startyear = Currentyear
	self.getChild("root").getChild("EnergyData").getChild("EnergyTopBar").getChild("EndMonth").props.value = Currentmonth
	self.getChild("root").getChild("EnergyData").getChild("EnergyTopBar").getChild("EndYear").props.value = Currentyear
	self.getChild("root").getChild("EnergyData").getChild("EnergyTopBar").getChild("StartMonth").props.value = Startmonth
	self.getChild("root").getChild("EnergyData").getChild("EnergyTopBar").getChild("StartYear").props.value = Startyear

transforms.code:
sum=0
	for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
		sum=sum+value.getValueAt(row,5)
	Avg = round(sum/value.getRowCount(),1)
	return Avg

newList = []
	headers = ["Month", "start", "End", "Energy", "AvgPower", "Peak", "Days"]
	months = int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.lookback)
	imonth = int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.startmonth)
	startyear = int(self.view.getChild("root").custom.startyear)
	iyear = startyear
	nextyear = iyear
	
	for i in range(months):
		if imonth>11.1:
			imonth = 0
			iyear = iyear+1
		nextyear=iyear
		nextmonth = imonth + 1
		if nextmonth>11.1:
			nextmonth = 0
		if value.getValueAt(0,1)==12 and imonth ==11:
			nextyear=iyear
		if value.getValueAt(0,1)==12 and imonth ==0:		
			nextyear=startyear+1
		if value.getValueAt(0,1)==1 and imonth ==11:
			nextyear=startyear+1
		if value.getValueAt(0,1)==1 and imonth ==0:
			nextyear=iyear
		enddate = system.date.getDate(nextyear, value.getValueAt(nextmonth,1)-1, value.getValueAt(nextmonth,2))
		if imonth==0 and value.getValueAt(0,1)==12:
			startdate = system.date.getDate(iyear-1, 11, value.getValueAt(imonth,2))
		else:		
			startdate = system.date.getDate(iyear, value.getValueAt(imonth,1)-1, value.getValueAt(imonth,2))
		energy = system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[self.custom.EnergyPath], startDate=startdate, endDate=enddate, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Range")
		energyvalue = energy.getValueAt(0,1)
		peak = system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[self.custom.Power15MinAverage], startDate=startdate, endDate=enddate, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Maximum")
		peakvalue = peak.getValueAt(0,1)
		daysinrange = system.date.daysBetween(startdate, enddate)
		AvgPower = energyvalue/daysinrange/24
		printmonth = imonth + 1
		newList.append([printmonth, startdate, enddate, float(energyvalue), float(AvgPower), float(peakvalue), daysinrange])
		imonth=imonth+1
		
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, newList)
	
	return dataset

d = system.date.daysBetween(self.custom.DateBeforeStartDate, self.custom.RoundUpEndDate)-1
	newData=[]
	headers = ['date', 'data']
	for i in range(d):
		x = value.getValueAt(i,0)
		y = value.getValueAt(i,1)
		newData.append([x,y*4])
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers,newData)
	return dataset
